posts.body:
>>136d55d0-cb9a-4a27-9a20-ebd3603b7cc2
Went on keto diet around Easter, lost a lot of weight and feeling good.
I'm taking on some personal projects at home, and helping my aging parents. I'm making a ultra comfy camping/chill site in the backyard.  When this shit world we live in gets to me, I have a place to go to be peaceful, read and chill. I'm wondering if I should pay the Amish to build me cabin back there.
Also, need to get an old Yamaha golf cart working to provide a quick ride to the site.

Just find some things to do Anon, don't get depressed, better yourself, and your life, do /sig/.
